metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36325 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in Jansson through 2.13.1. Due to a parsing error in json_loads, there's an out-of-bounds read-access bug. NOTE: the vendor reports that this only occurs when a programmer fails to follow the API specification.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this was an issue in the fuzzer code, not in the library itself https://github.com/akheron/jansson/issues/548#issuecomment-828007511 disputed by upstream, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: jansson: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
